citation: Proclamation under the Sentencing Amendment Act 2002 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Sentencing Amendment Act 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Sentencing Amendment Act 2002 fix 1 October 2002 as the day on which sections 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 9(b) , 10 and 11 of that Act commence.

30 September 2002

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 October 2002

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
